name: Penetrating Stare
text: Your stare penetrates right through your foe’s strongest mental defenses.
prerequisites: Mesmerist level 7th, painful stare class feature.
benefit: When you trigger your painful stare, the damage dealt ignores 5 points of the target’s damage reduction, unless that damage reduction is untyped (for example, DR 10/—).
text_zh: 你的注视直接穿透了敌人最强的心理防线。
prerequisites_zh: 催眠师7级，痛苦注视职业特性。
benefit_zh: 当你启动你的痛苦注视时，造成的伤害忽视目标5点伤害减免，除非该伤害减免无类型（例如 DR 10/-）。
